name: elogio-firefox
title: elogio-firefox
description: Add-on for getting metadata from image on the web page
author: Fedorov Artem

preferences.name: highlightRecognizedImages
preferences.title: Highlight Recognized Images
preferences.description: If enabled plugin will outline each recognized image on the page

preferences.name: deepScan
preferences.title: Deep scan
preferences.description: If enabled plugin will scan images and backgrounds
